PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-04792014-05-01,  ,  ,  DESD,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to update the income eligibility thresholds to account for inflation, and ensure that eligibility for Canada Student Grants and Part Time-Canada Student Loans into consideration student real income.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0100 Publication Date: 2014-05-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to update the income eligibility thresholds to account for inflation, and ensure that eligibility for Canada Student Grants and Part Time-Canada Student Loans into consideration student real income.
